name: Oliver's Boss Fight #1
description:
Oliver's Boss Fight #1

This boss takes on two forms. There's 10 HP for the first form and 20 HP for the second. A little twist is that you can only shoot from the pylons / towers. Good luck!

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Move Left and Right
  • Spacebar - Shoot (you can only shoot from the pylons)
  • R - Restart the game
